data.title: Gerald Wallace, Basketball Player
data.meta_description: Gerald Wallace stats and bio. Stats averages season by season. Quick access to game by game stats.
data.text:
Gerald Wallace - Points

Gerald Wallace scores a career high 42 points (2007)

On January 31, 2007, Gerald Wallace set his career high in points in a NBA game. That day he scored 42 points in Charlotte's home win against New York, 104-87. He also had 8 rebounds, 3 assists, 1 steal and 3 blocks. He shot 11/17 from two, 3/5 from three, shooting at 63.6% from the field. He also shot 11/17 from the free-throw line.

Gerald Wallace - Rebounds

Gerald Wallace grabs a career high 20 rebounds (2009)

On November 02, 2009, Gerald Wallace tied his career high in rebounds in a NBA game. That day he grabbed 20 rebounds in Charlotte's home win against New Jersey, 79-68. He also had 24 points, 4 steals and 1 block.

Gerald Wallace - Assists

Gerald Wallace gives a career high 10 assists (2008)

On January 26, 2008, Gerald Wallace set his career high in assists in a NBA game. That day he dished 10 assists in Charlotte's home loss against Philadelphia, 96-103. He also had 20 points, 3 rebounds, 1 steal and 1 block.

Gerald Wallace - Steals

Gerald Wallace has a career high 8 steals (2006)

On January 13, 2006, Gerald Wallace set his career high in steals in a NBA game. That day he reached 8 steals in Charlotte's home loss against Milwaukee, 102-103. He also had 21 points, 15 rebounds and 4 assists.

Gerald Wallace - Blocks

Gerald Wallace blocks a career high 6 shots (2004)

On November 26, 2004, Gerald Wallace tied his career high in blocks in a NBA game. That day he went for 6 blocks in Charlotte's road loss against Indiana, 82-77. He also had 6 points, 10 rebounds and 1 assist.
